description:
The investment seeks, through its investment in the master fund, to reflect the performance of the index, over time, less the expenses of the fund and the master fund’s overall operations.
 The master fund invests in a portfolio of index commodities, as well as holding cash and United States Treasury securities and other high credit quality short-term fixed income securities for deposit with the master fund’s Commodity Broker as margin. The Continuous Commodity Total Return Index is a broad based commodity index that reflects the price movement of 17 exchange-traded futures contracts.
